title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra vs iPhone 17 Pro Max: Spec-by-spec breakdown, India pricing, and features compared

snippet: Samsung launched the Galaxy S26 and S26+ with the Dynamic AMOLED displays, upgraded processors, and Qi2 charging. The S26 starts at $899.99 while the S26+ begins at $1,099.99&nbsp;

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor launched in India: Price, specs and more

title: SpaceX could seek IPO valuation of over $1.75 trillion: Bloomberg
snippet: Elon Musk’s SpaceX plans a confidential initial public offering that could value the rocket and satellite firm above $1.75 trillion, Bloomberg reported. The filing may come in March, though timing could change. The report said a June IPO is likely, matching that schedule.

title: Trump orders US agencies to stop using Anthropic technology in clash over AI safety
snippet: The Trump administration has ordered all U.S. government agencies to stop using artificial intelligence technology from Anthropic and imposed penalties on the company after a dispute over military access to its AI tools.
